item.description:
Kudeta is a fusion Asian Restaurant serving authentic Chinese, Indonesian, and Thai Cuisines with hints of Indian.This is a fun place and should have something for every palate. They are located in Downtown New Haven, with a convenient parking lot next door if you canâ€™t find street parking.

Kudeta offers an extensive saki and wine list to please the most sophisticated palate. The atmosphere is wonderful, they have reserved a nice area for us where we will also have the opportunity to mingle. After dinner we can head out to one of the local bars for drinks and music.

http://www.kudetanewh...

Hope to see you there!!!

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Asian Fusion and Fun at Kudeta
